page.title: 07LANDSCAPE 3
page.content: greengrocer,butcher,dentist,betting shop and funeral director's office.To the north of Pilch Lane is Dovecot Park with its pleasant walks and childrens' playground. South-east quarter: here the children distributed a total of 359 questionnaires to the residents in that area of study. Of these questionnaires, 167 (46%) were returned to the School. Here are some sample questions with answers as recorded. {Where do you shop locally ? 15%replied: in Greystone Road 73%replied: in Childwall Parade 7.5%replied: in Swanside Road 4.5%replied: nowhere locally. {Which local leisure facilities do you {use ? { }Huyton Leisure Centre Court Hey Bowling Greens
